@Ivyasdhruvil Hi Dhruvil, failure to check-in for a SpiceJet flight at least 60 minutes prior to scheduled departure time results in fare being forfeited as the ticket is marked as No-Show. As per our records, passenger reported after the counter closure hence, the ticket is marked no show.
@MohsinAndrabi Hi Mohsin, please note that the power bank can be carried only in hand baggage. You may carry power banks with a maximum capacity of up to 30000 mAh.

@FaizanA65274366 Kindly note that a passenger can carry a laptop bag/ladies purse/duty-free shopping bag additionally, as long as the total weight of cabin baggage does not exceed 7 kg. In case of excess baggage, charges shall be applicable.
@rohangurjar Our team shall get back to you at the earliest. We request your patience.
@FaizanA65274366 You're welcome! As mentioned, it is not allowed on our flights.
